channel.title: I need help. My server freezes. HELP!@
channel.description:
Ok my server runs absolutly fantastic on my computer but when I try to run it on the website hosting my server, it makes me appear with a different name then freezes. I herd that I need to get a new source. . If you think my server is working amazin but freezin on the internet because of the source please say so. Well if you can help it will be SOOO apreciated!
I will let you know everything thats happening.
1st. I run the source. ( It's running now. ) 2nd. I make sure no-ip is logged on. 3rd. I go to my clients internet address. 4th. When at the address it loads properly, and i type my gamertag in and everything. 5th. The client loads and then a whole bunch of wierd #### happens. 6th. I appear with a random name, i am invisable, and the the client freezes out. 7th. After freezing out it says all the normals stuff. 1. clear your tabs. ex. 8th. I have tried to change the ip to the no-ip domain but it didn't work.
And all i want is for it to stop freezing. It 100% works for me when I play it on my comp. Not on the address that I put it on. If anyon can please tell me how to stop my server from freezing you will get (+) rep on here and staff on my server. "Just for telling me how to fix it!!!!!"

item.title: I need help. My server freezes. HELP!@
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

Ok so what would you recomend? I have a 317 client. should i get a different 317 source?

And if i do… Which do you recomind. Do i have to rename and recode all that stuff again when i get a new source, or will i be good?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help. My server freezes. HELP!@

item.title: I need help. My server freezes. HELP!@
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Well,from the looks of it,it’s probably your’e source OR it’s something wrong with the webclient you made.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help. My server freezes. HELP!@

item.title: I need help. My server freezes. HELP!@
item.dc:creator: @Ninja111 Ninja111
item.description:
@Ninja111 wrote:

Im sorry i ment im playing my client.

  1. I start up my source. ( It says: Online. )
  2. I go to my client website address. Click sign in put my username and pass then the client loads. After loading my person pops up invisable with a random gamertag, then the server freezes.
  3. After freezing all that stuff pops up 1. reset your browser. blahh blahh.

I just want to know how to stop my server from freezing. If you want to know the spacific server I downloaded from here i’ll give it to you.

I have done absolulty every step that im supposed to. The server is a 317. I opend a gaming port in my moddum. I downloaded no-ip. I went in my computer and got my ip. Is there absolutly anything that i could have done wrong to make my server freeze when trying to loggin??

It absolutly works 100% when I play it from my comp.
But when I try to from that host site it freezes.
Is that site bad or something?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help. My server freezes. HELP!@

item.title: I need help. My server freezes. HELP!@
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

[quote=“Ninja111, post:14, topic:385834”]server / source what ever you call it. Im playing the server on my computer and its working 100%.
BUT when I try and play my server from the website that i have hosting to get people to my server it freezes.
I don’t understand why the server is amazing on my comp. but on the site it freezes.[/quote]
sorry you lost me

Read full topic

My player when i try to logging appears invisable with a random acc name then the server freezes. WTF is wrong with it. IT works amazing when i play it on my computer, but when i try to play it on the host website it freezes like hell![/quote]

are you talking about your custom webclient?

    The requested URL /?action=statuschecker was not found on this server. That’s all we know.[/quote]

kk go here it it keept changing[quote=“ii bandos ii, post:9, topic:385834”][quote author=Ninja111 link=topic=481591.msg3526801#msg3526801 date=1299885491]
Is it againts the moparscape rules for me to give you my server address? I just want to see if my server freezes you. I want this crap fixed.
[/quote][/quote] my r u n e l o c u s it’s with no space’s to google.com it keeps ppl from advertisting here use this i fixed it

Yes I would recommend you to go to go here click here.

item.title: I need help. My server freezes. HELP!@
item.dc:creator: @ii_bandos_ii ii bandos ii
item.description:
@ii_bandos_ii wrote:

[quote=“Ninja111, post:4, topic:385834”]Well i have my source running now but people still freeze. Hum my source does say somthing a little wierd after making it online.

Let me show you what it says.

Voule Auto restart
Could not find process: java
Restarting server
Online.

Also, If i get a new source/ server will the client I have be usable to the new source??[/quote]

[quote=“Ninja111, post:4, topic:385834”]Well i have my source running now but people still freeze. Hum my source does say somthing a little wierd after making it online.

Let me show you what it says.

Voule Auto restart
Could not find process: java
Restarting server
Online.[/quote]

Put this in to the run.bat that you use to run the server and you wont have any more of that “vaule auto restart” (what it is a restarter that restart’s your server every let’s say 30 min or 1 hour but for you to use it it’s hard to explain you need to put it under your own jdk and i got no clue what jdk you got atm) so post this in your run.bat right click it and press edit and post this in to it @echo off title Running... java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit

Read full topic
